data.name: Thief Girls Quartet
data.detailed_description:
Thief Girls Quartet tells the story of a group of thieving girls who steal valuable treasures that an evil merchant has hidden in a giant tower.
The thieving girls can move around freely using wires.
Let's find the treasure that lies at the top of the tower together!

Worldview

The time is 19th century London, somewhere else, different from here.
A billboard in the city reads, "A Mysterious Giant Tower with a Hidden National Treasure Discovered".
In the Forest of Farewell, where the fog never clears for a year, a huge tower that rises to the heavens has been found.
It was said to contain a valuable treasure hidden there by an evil merchant.
With their hearts racing, the girls head for the giant tower in search of the treasure...

Characters

There are four main characters in this game.
The girls look normal during the daytime, but at night they become thief girls and work to steal treasures.

Game Features

①Wire action

『Don't fall, it's dangerous!』

The biggest feature of this game is the "wire action" operation.
The player can use the wire to advance to the top of the tower.

Each stage contains the mechanisms of the tower, and the player must conquer those mechanisms to reach the top of the tower!
If you can't hook the wire, you will fall and get into a dangerous situation!

②Online and local multiplayer mode

You'll enjoy this game more if you play it in multiplayer mode! We recommend the online/local multiplayer mode, where you can play in a lively atmosphere.
We recommend online/local multiplayer, where you can play together with other players.

Number of players: 1-4 players for local play / up to 4 players for online play

③Treasure Hunt

There are a total of 20 stages where you can enjoy experiencing "wire action treasure hunting".
In each stage, there is a treasure hidden.
Finding the treasure is also a bit of fun in this game.

data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400H
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
